segments.text: I'm shocked by how much water is spilling from that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman keeps drying her plate, completely zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is getting wet from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the kidsâ€” that boy is way up on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's leaning back precariously; he could tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's dipping into the cookie jar like a pro thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, palm out for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so bold, right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, totally at odds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one hears the water running.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears with a slip or fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes might crash if things go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a lively, chaotic family moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
